## Problem 10.3
<!-----  Use vif ------> 

```{r}
mantel
```


```{r}
plot(mantel)
```


```{r}
model <- lm(Y ~ X1 + X2 + X3, data=mantel)
summary(model)
```
```{r}
v <- vif(model)
rsqrd <- (v - 1) / v
rsqrd
```

```{r}
forward <- lm(Y ~ 1, data=mantel)
step(forward, scope = ~ X1 + X2 + X3, direction="forward")


```

```{r}
backward = lm(Y ~ X1 + X2 + X3, data=mantel)
step(backward, scope = ~ 1, direction="backward")
```
